title: Research Briefing: Structural Load from Energy Infrastructure, HVAC Integration in Superstructure, Vertical Distribution Shafts & Risers + 26 more — Feb 21, 2026
description: Daily research digest covering 29 sessions: Structural Load from Energy Infrastructure, HVAC Integration in Superstructure, Vertical Distribution Shafts & Risers, Energy-Water Nexus & Thermal Recovery, Power Distribution to Building Systems, Plumbing-Water-Waste Integration Loop, Vertical Urbanism - Floor Plate Design & Public Space, Elevator Networks & Vertical Mobility, Indoor Air Quality & Green Space Integration, AI-Managed Grid & Demand Response, Sensor Networks & Environmental Monitoring, Predictive Maintenance & Building Automation, Smart City Services & Digital Twin, Build Sequence & Structural Phasing, MEP Installation During Vertical Construction, AI Governance & Autonomous System Oversight, Energy Policy & Resource Allocation, Zoning, Land Use & Community Governance, Fire Safety Codes & Emergency Management at Scale, Construction Power & Temporary Energy Systems, Vertical Farmer - Food Production Worker, Water Reclamation Technician, Elevator Dispatch Coordinator, Residential Floor Captain (Community Leader), New Arrival - First 90 Days in the Arcology, Maintenance Worker - The Person Who Fixes Everything, Street Artist & Cultural Producer, Compute Allocation Trader (Cycles Economy Worker), Security & Conflict Mediation.
